name: Tom Haverford Cocktail
description: This brunch drink from Southpaw BBQ in San Francisco is like a cross between sangria and soda, with a kick of herbal complexity from Root liqueur by Art in the Age.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup Syrah or other fruity red wine
1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon freshly squeezed juice from 5 to 6 lemons

recipeInstructions.text: Add ice, wine, simple syrup, Root liqueur, and lemon to a large pitcher. Stir until well chilled. Divide among ice-filled glasses, garnish each glass with an orange wedge and serve immediately.
